page.title: 04Upottery's Farm Livestock 1
page.content: The Farms in our area keep{dairy herds and{beef}mainly but some have sheep and pigs or grow some crops. {Milking a cow. When you milk a cow,you first turn on the machine then bring in several cows. Chain them up and wipe their udders. Put the clusters on their teats. At the end of the clusters there is a pipe which takes the milk to the jar.When the cow is milked out take the clusters off and turn two levers and the milk will go in to the tank.Then you turn off the machine and a cow is milked.{ { { Cow and a calf. } When a cow is ready to calve you ring the vet and he comes and puts it in calve When the cow has calved you can give it some water.
